archimate:Requirement.name: TM.2.3.2b: b) emergency access for key individuals (e.g. business managers or users, system administrators, systems development staff and suppliers of equipment, software or services).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
